message:
Hi Guys,
Is Entity Framework suitable for application which makes automated operations, most of these operations are inserting using multiple threads ?

my case is : 
- small database contain 8 tables
- only two table are used for automated insert and they are the main tables for the system 
- the application perform insert operations in parallel
- the underline table contain about 1.5 millions of records 
//note, i used instance per request 

Please advise

data.message:
Most ORMs are not good for batch operations on millions of records. For this use case, people do on of these

1. Use a product for data migration. Mainly MS SSIS
2. C# program using SqlDataReader & family
3. C# program using a micro ORM like dapper

Just make sure to handle failures!
Dapper is a good for this case, i had the same issue in one of big eCommerce websites and the best solution was using Dapper i really highly recommend it

Also take a look on petapoco 
 http://www.toptensoftware.com/petapoco/

Easy , simple and super fast like dapper
